EditTextPreference.android:title: Controller's Host
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The URL to the controller, excluding trailing slash.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Controller's First Pin
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The first pin number for the first relay.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Controller's Number of Relays
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The number of relays in use, normally in increments of 4.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Controller Reverse Logic
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Use this if your relay bank has reverse logic, e.g. if turning a pin off actually turns the relay on.

ListPreference.android:title: Bluetooth Device
ListPreference.android:summary: Select the bluetooth device for the Vulcanus you wish to use.
